review.reviewBody: So I ordered this because it was a new product from my still favorite vendor kratom spot. I figured because it was new that it would be fresh. Fresh kratom is the best kratom. You can tell that it is definitly fermented. I usually drink my kratom mixed with water so taste means a lot to me. This stuff kinda tastes more like a tea which makes sense because tea is fermented. This is one of the easiest powders to drink down. As far as potentcey it isnt the strongest but its by far not the weakest. This is the best fermented kratom I have tried. If taste matters then I would recommend this. If you just cap it up then buy something stronger considering the price. I will buy again because its always nice to have something different than regular kratom on hand. hope this helps.

review.reviewBody: Being brand new to Kratom, I couldn’t be more pleased to have chosen Kratom Spot for my first online purchase. I wish I’d gone with my gut on this before buying my very first Kratom from a local smoke shop.  That decision almost caused me to give up on Kratom before it began as there was very little, if any, effectiveness, it was crazy expensive, and the employees suggested the exact opposite vein I needed for the relief I was seeking.  The info given on Kratom Spot’s site is easy to understand, allowing me to choose exactly what I need, products are extremely effective, pricing is great and maybe best of all, Kratom Spot’s delivery is incredible!  My first order arrived in 3 days and my second is being delivered 2 days after placing my order.  Thank you for helping navigate the confusing waters (for me) of Kratom.  Dealing with Kratom Spot has truly been a wonderful experience on every level!

bali-kratom-powders-capsules.above_the_fold_texts:
Premium Bali Kratom Strains

Kratom Spot offers high-quality Bali kratom products, harvested using Fair Trade from small family farms on the island of Bali. Our Bali kratom capsules and powder are crafted without additives, fillers, or preservatives, offering a clean and consistent experience. 

Bali kratom is popular for its versatility, with a strain to fit every mood, whether you’re looking for a green, white, or red vein. Browse our selection of premium Bali Kratom powders and capsules.
bali-kratom-powders-capsules.description:
Why Choose Kratom Spot

Kratom Spot offers top-quality kratom powder and capsules, sourced directly from the island of Bali for superior potency and freshness. Our products are lab-tested to ensure safety, purity, and consistency and are free of any fillers or additives. At Kratom Spot, quality is always our top priority:
  • Lab-tested for safety, purity, and consistency.
  • Wide selection of popular strains available in powder and capsule form.
  • Pure and natural, free from any additives, chemicals, or fillers.
  • Sourced through Fair Trade practices.
  • Delivered fresh in airtight packaging for maximum freshness.

Buy Premium Bali Kratom Products Online

We offer several different strains of Bali Kratom, cultivated by the finest producers on the island of Bali. Our most popular Bali strains include:

Bali Powders

  • Bali White Vein Powder

  • Bali Red Vein Powder

  • Ultra Bali Powder

Bali Capsules

  • Red Bali Capsules

Our Customers Come First

At Kratom Spot, we’re Kratom enthusiasts ourselves, which is why we know that finding an online Kratom vendor you can trust is easier said than done. That’s why we want to provide our customers with the best possible shopping experience and be here to answer any questions you may have about our Kratom products. If you have any questions, reach out to our dedicated support team.
  • Enjoy same-day shipping on orders placed before 3:00 PM EST on weekdays
  • Free shipping on orders over $50.
  • We stand behind the quality of our products and offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee - or your money back.

Bali Kratom FAQ

Bali kratom is kratom that originates on the island of Bali, Indonesia. Bali is known for lush rainforests that span volcanic mountaintops and unique biodiversity. Bali kratom is hailed as a premium strain, favored by a wide variety of kratom users.

Yes, Bali kratom is safe.  Kratom Spot's products are backed by third-party Certificates of Analysis (CoA's) from independent laboratories. CoA's allow you to verify that your kratom is 100% free of harmful additives, chemicals, heavy metals, and more.

Red Bali kratom is sourced from mature Bali kratom leaves with red veins, which contain higher levels of the alkaloid 7-hydroxymitragynine.

White Vein Bali kratom is harvested in the early stages of kratom leaf maturity, resulting in higher mitragynine levels and lower 7-hydroxymitragynine alkaloid levels.

Ultra Bali Kratom is a premium Bali kratom strain with high alkaloid potency, including both mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynine. It's sourced from experienced farms in South East Asia and is 100% natural with no chemical additives. Kratom Spot prioritizes the health and safety of its users and tests each batch for purity, potency, and safety through third-party laboratories.

Bali kratom can be consumed in a variety of forms, with little effect on its effects or bioavailability; however, the main benefit of using kratom capsules is their convenience. These flavorless gel capsules, which come pre-measured with a precise dosage, provide a mess-free and fast-release experience and are ideal for those who dislike the taste of kratom.

Red Vein Strain FAQ

Red kratom is a strain of the plant Mitragyna Speciosa, more commonly known as kratom. This particular strain is characterized by the red-colored veins in the leaves, which is where its name originates. Red kratom is known for its calming and relaxing effects, making it a popular choice for those looking to unwind after a long day.

Yes, red vein kratom is safe. Plus, Kratom Spot backs every red vein kratom product with third-party Certificates of Analysis, known as CoA’s, to verify that your kratom is safe, effective, and free from additives or fillers.

Red Thai Kratom is a red kratom strain that was originally grown and harvested in Thailand. Thailand enjoys a warm and tropical climate that supports healthy and productive kratom farming. Also, Thailand tends to have more acidic soil than some other regions. These conditions often result in red vein kratom strains that are quite high in mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynin.

Red Indo Kratom is a strain grown in the tropical islands of Indonesia, then harvested at peak maturity when the kratom's veins have begun to turn red. This is largely due to the highly acidic and mineral-rich soil that comes from the islands' volcanic origins. Red vein Indo kratom has been preferred by many experienced users for its high alkaloid content, including both mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynina.

Red Sumatra Kratom comes from Indonesia's Sumatra island. As with any place, the island's unique soil composition affects the alkaloid concentration of the kratom crop and the effects of capsules, powder, and extracts made from the red strain. Due to Sumatra's climate and agricultural procedures, red vein kratom users choose Sumatra reds for their alkaloid balance. Red Sumatra Kratom powder and capsules are a crowd-favorite and a good place to start.

Red Maeng Da Kratom, a red vein kratom strain, is not geographically specific. South East Asia produces Maeng Da, which originated in Thailand. Grafting various strains together creates Maeng Da. Farmers raised red kratom alkaloid levels by merging two or more powerful and effective red vein strains (and, therefore, effects). "Maeng Da" is Thai meaning "pimp grade", slang for this high-quality red vein kratom strain's potency.

Red Bali Kratom is a red vein kratom that was grown and harvested in Bali, a small island province of Indonesia. Bali's lush jungles have rich, loamy, slightly acidic soil that tends to produce red kratom with higher than-average levels of high alkaloids. The climate conditions are also perfect for kratom farming, allowing for year-round growth and harvesting. Premium red vein bali is one of the most popular and widely-available red kratom strains worldwide.

Red Malay Kratom is, as its name suggests, a strain of red kratom that has its origins in Malaysia. The unique soil content and farming practices of Malaysia led to a local red vein kratom being highly regarded in the kratom leaf farming community. As a result, Malaysian kratom is now grown using Malaysian farming practices throughout South East Asia. Red Malay Kratom has proved to be one of the most popular red vein kratom strains, and it's easy to understand why.

Both of these alkaloids are important for kratom’s effects, and the ratio of the two accounts for the difference in users' experience. Only experience can accurately teach you which red vein kratom’s alkaloid profiles and effects will meet your needs best.

Whether you’re taking red kratom capsules, powder, tea, or any other form of red vein kratom, proper dosage is going to depend on a wide variety of factors. White Kratom Strain FAQ

Like its red and green cousins, white vein kratom is a class of kratom defined by the color of the plant's veins and stem prior to harvesting. The "white vein" label is one of the two key ways that these kratom plants, powder, and capsules are defined. The other classification, such as "Indo", "Bali", or "Sumatra" is a reference to the particular strain's origins, and most often where in South East Asia the strain was originally grown. The color of white vein kratom isn't just for looks. It also indicates the maturity of the leaf and the alkaloid content of the plants. As kratom leaves mature, their veins shift from white to green to red, meaning that white vein kratom is made from kratom leaves in their earliest harvestable state. Harvesting white kratom at this time also affects the levels of alkaloids in the leaf, including mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynine, the compounds responsible for kratom's unique effects. So even though white vein kratom's effects will vary based on their strain (Indo vs. Bali vs. Maeng Da kratom, etc.), there are similarities between these strains that give white vein kratom its distinctive effects.
Although the alkaloid content of white vein kratom differs slightly from red or green vein strains, the same natural compounds are present in all three varieties of kratom leaf, powder, and capsules. As such, white vein kratom is just as safe as any other strain - though white kratom's unique balance of mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynine give it effects somewhat different than its red or green cousins. Only first-hand experience can teach you precisely how white vein kratom will interact with your unique biochemistry and lifestyle. Regardless of which strain of kratom you are interested in, there are a few important things to consider before making a purchase. Whether you like red, green, or white kratom strains, it's extremely important to ensure that your kratom is free from any harmful contaminants such as pesticides, fungicides, and heavy metals. Make sure to source your kratom from reputable vendors, like Kratom Spot, who can provide comprehensive Certificates of Analysis, or "CoA's". These CoA's prove the purity, potency, and safety of your kratom powder and capsules, so you can be confident you're making the right choice for your health.
"Indo Kratom" is a term referring to a particular strain of the mitragyna speciosa plant, which grows naturally in several regions of South East Asia. This particular strain was originally cultivated in Indonesia. Indonesia was formed by a number of volcanic events, which has left Indonesian soil with a high acid content; when kratom is grown in this soil, it often results in a premium crop with comparatively high alkaloid levels. Indo kratom is prized in much of the kratom community, with groups from reddit and other online communities celebrating it as a crowd-favorite strain. When processed, the leaf of indo kratom makes for premium quality powder, capsules, tea, and extract. Available in white, green, and red vein varieties, we are proud to offer Indo Kratom of the highest quality.
White Bali Kratom is a white vein kratom strain that was originally developed, grown, and harvested in Bali, a small island province of Indonesia. Bali's startling beauty and consistent, temperate climate aren't just great for attracting tourists - they're also ideal for growing healthy and effective kratom leaf. The climate conditions in Bali allow local farmers to grow alkaloid-rich white kratom strains year-round. White Vein kratom from Bali also benefits from the rich, loamy, and slightly acidic soil on the island. The soil composition of Bali's lush jungles is extremely rich in compounds that help produce a vibrant and healthy white kratom leaf, packed with the natural alkaloids that give kratom its unique effects. As a result of these vibrant farming conditions and year-round growth, White Bali Kratom is one of the world's most popular and widely-available strains.
Red Sumatra Kratom is a red vein kratom strain originally grown and harvested in Sumatra, an island in Indonesia. As with any region, the unique soil composition of the island has a distinct effect on the alkaloid content of the resulting kratom crop - and on the effects of the capsules, powder, and extracts made from the kratom red strain. Many red vein kratom users find that Sumatra reds are their favorite strain, owing to the unique balance of alkaloids that result from Sumatra's unique climate and farming practices. While only experience can teach you which strain fits your needs best, Red Sumatra Kratom powder and capsules are a crowd-favorite and an excellent place to start.
White Borneo Kratom is one of the many different varieties of kratom leaf. White Borneo Kratom refers to a specific strain of kratom, which originated in Borneo, part of South East Asia's Malay Archipelago. Many online kratom communities, including reddit and others, often regard Borneo kratom strains as some of the most potent and potentially effective, due largely to Borneo's tropical climate and well-developed agricultural practices. Of course, the proper white kratom strain for your needs depends on a wide variety of personal and physiological factors. But in the opinion of many long-time white kratom strain enthusiasts, White Borneo kratom is an extremely attractive option.
White Maeng Da Kratom is a variety of kratom that has its origins in Thailand. Like all white strains, it is made from kratom leaf that is harvested early in the growth cycle, and the resulting kratom powder, capsules, and extracts are comparatively high in mitragynine levels. Unlike most other white kratom strains, however, Maeng Da is not named after its location of origin. Rather, "Maeng Da kratom" translates roughly to "pimp grade kratom", a reference to its high quality and potency. White Maeng Da kratom is made by splicing several regional varieties of kratom together, deliberately combining the desirable properties of several white kratom plants to create a sort of super-crop. The result is a white kratom strain of unusually high potency and alkaloid content.
White vein kratom is used for a variety of purposes by individuals from all walks of life. Depending on the dosage taken, the balance of mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynine alkaloids found in white kratom strains can have significantly different effects. Unfortunately, FDA regulations prevent kratom vendors such as Kratom Spot from making direct claims about these effects, or even about the specific ways in which different strains affect users differently. If you are a new user looking to get a better base of knowledge about the unique effects of different green, red, or white kratom strains, we encourage you to do research with other, non kratom vendor sites such as the American Kratom Association.
Generally speaking, white vein kratom strains have the highest ratio of mitragynine to 7-hydroxymitragynine. That's because white kratom leaf is harvested at the earliest viable stages of kratom farming. The color of kratom leaf veins and stems is determined by their age and, more directly, the balance of alkaloids they contain. As kratom leaves mature, the concentration of mitragynine diminishes and the concentration of 7-hydroxymitragynine increases. This change in the ratio of natural alkaloids is what causes the shift in kratom's white veins to green and, eventually, red. White vein kratom is, in this way, the youngest version of green and red kratom - but is also the version that is highest in mitragynine levels!
Proper white vein kratom dosage is one of the most important aspects of ensuring a positive experience with kratom use. However, it is virtually impossible to provide a one-size-fits-all dosing recommendation, as there are a huge variety of factors to consider. Proper dosage may be different depending on whether you choose a Borneo, Maeng Da, Thai, Malay, Bali, Indo, or Sumatran kratom strain. It will also depend on your height and weight, your experience with and tolerance for kratom, and a number of other physiological factors. We always recommend that you start with a very small dosage whenever you begin using a new strain. That is especially important when you choose a strain of white vein kratom with higher than average alkaloid levels. Maeng Da kratom, for instance, is renowned in kratom communities such as reddit for its potency. Regardless of your past experience with other strains, it is always a good idea to start small with a new white vein kratom variety.
Absolutely yes, you can make tea with white vein kratom powder! Thai Kratom Strain FAQ

The term “Thai Kratom” refers to a popular strain of the kratom or “mitragyna speciosa” plant. This strain was originally harvested in Thailand, whose unique climate and soil content create a powerful and distinctive strain of kratom. By duplicating the traditional agricultural practices and environmental factors indigenous to Thailand, farms throughout the region can produce a quality crop that bears Thai Kratom’s distinctive alkaloid profile and effects.
In terms of alkaloid content, Thai kratom has the same blend of natural compounds as any other strain of kratom. The balance of alkaloids in each strain differs, but the basic building blocks of the plant, including mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynine, remain the same. As such, our premium Thai kratom is just as safe as any other strain. However, only first-hand experience can teach you just how your body will react to Thai kratom leaf or the capsules and powder made from it. Whenever you’re looking to try a new strain of kratom, it is extremely important to review the Certificates of Analysis (“CoA’s”) for it. Any reputable vendor should be able to provide these CoA’s, which are the results of laboratory tests that prove the purity, potency, and safety of your kratom products. At Kratom Spot, we are proud to carry only the best kratom in the world, and we have the test results to prove it.
Like any strain of kratom, Thai Kratom is a versatile product with many uses. However, the regional variety and color of your Thai kratom will have an effect on your kratom experience. More important, however, is finding the proper dosage size for your particular needs, as different doses will significantly affect the results you experience. Unfortunately, FDA regulations prevent kratom vendors from making recommendations about kratom strains and their effects. As such, we recommend doing independent research at non-vendor sites and communities such as the American Kratom Association.
Like any strain of kratom, Thai Kratom is available in a variety of color variations. These reflect the time of harvest and the unique balance of kratom alkaloids, which shift gradually as the plant matures. Kratom Spot currently offers two top-quality colors of Thai Kratom: green and red. Green vein kratom is harvested earlier in the maturation cycle, while red vein is harvested late in the kratom tree’s life cycle. Both strains are of the highest standard, but users may have a preference for one or the other, depending on their intended purpose for taking kratom.
Thai kratom strains are regarded as a top-quality pick by many in the kratom community. However, no single strain is the “best”, and different users will find that different strains may be preferable for their purposes. Even if you find that Thai Kratom is ideal for their purposes, you may wish to employ other regional varieties from time to time. Rotating strains in this matter can allow you to branch out and experience what other strains have to offer, keep your experience enjoyable, and avoid “stagnant strain syndrome”.
Kratom Spot offers what can only be described as the world’s very best kratom. We source all of our strains, including our Thai Kratom varieties, from Southeast Asia’s most experienced and responsible kratom farms. We process and package our strains in industry-leading clean rooms with cutting-edge technology. We package our strains in resealable fresh-lock packaging that keeps your favorite strains at peak levels for as long as possible. In every regard, we hold our products to the highest standard: and we back our products with a 100% satisfaction money-back guarantee.
Finding the proper dose of kratom is the single most important factor for ensuring you have a positive kratom experience. When starting with a new strain, the best idea is always to start with a very small dose. Even if you are an experienced kratom user, different strains can cause different effects, and you may be surprised by the differences when trying a new option. Always start small until you are confident of the effects the strains you take will have on your unique physiology.
Yes, all strains of Kratom Spot kratom are independently lab-tested to ensure quality, purity, and potency. We stand by the quality of each of our strains, but you shouldn’t take it from us. Independent testing of this sort is the ONLY way to be sure that the product you’ll receive is of truly unimpeachable quality. To ensure that you have an enjoyable, quality kratom experience, purchase only from reputable vendors like Kratom Spot, who can provide independent lab-certification for every batch of product.
Thai kratom strains have a rich, distinctive alkaloid profile — but it’s difficult to generalize the mitragynine content between the strains. That’s partly because of seasonal variations in the harvest yield, but also because different strain colors have different balances of mitragynine and 7-hydroxymitragynine. As kratom strains mature from white to green to red, the mitragynine levels slowly lower while the 7-hydroxymitragynine levels increase. These alkaloid shifts are yet another reason why comprehensive, independent lab testing is vital to ensuring that you receive a quality process. Our lab tests ensure a potent and robust alkaloid profile in every batch of our Thai kratom.
Yes, Thai Kratom is a great option for making your own DIY kratom tea! Any strain of kratom can, in fact, be made into delicious tea, but you may find that certain strains are preferable for your purposes. Only first-hand experience can tell you for sure which you like best, so try out all your favorites!

Sumatra Kratom

Kratom Spot offers premium Sumatra kratom products, capturing both the power and eloquence of this unique strain. Sumatra kratom derives from the island of Sumatra, isolated on a western sliver of Indonesia. Here, tropical mitragyna speciosa trees – also known as kratom trees – grow delicate red vein and white vein kratom leaves. We source these leaves responsibly through certified Fair Trade practices, bringing the magic of Western Indonesian kratom products to your front door.

At Kratom Spot, we’re committed to providing the best Sumatra kratom products on the market. We oversee the entire process, from leaf to harvest to manufacturing and, of course, your finished products. Sumatra kratom is known as a specialized strain among kratom aficionados, able to boost the overall strength of your daily kratom regimen. We’re confident that our Sumatra strains will suit each and every one of your kratom-related needs.

Sumatra Kratom FAQ

Sumatra kratom is the strain of kratom derived from mitragyna speciosa trees located in Sumatra, Indonesia. Sumatra constitutes the isolated, western portion of the Southeast Asian country, nestled among the tropical enclaves of the Pacific Ocean region. Sumatra kratom products are known for their versatility and power, perfect for seasoned kratom users and quality-lovers alike.
We recommend Sumatra kratom to experienced kratom users. Sumatra kratom products tend to offer more strength and potency than your standard kratom strains. Because of this, we’d suggest that new users only try Sumatra kratom after experimenting with other popular strains. We also recommend that anyone switching to Sumatra kratom start with a slightly lower dose than they would normally take. In this way, you can smoothly transition to the powerful effects of Sumatra kratom without disrupting your regular kratom routine.
Sumatra kratom is available in both red vein and white vein varieties. Sumatra kratom is not available as a green vein kratom powder. However, you can create a kratom blend using equal parts red vein and white vein Sumatra kratom powders, potentially mimicking the would-be effects of green vein Sumatra Kratom powder. You can also purchase Sumatra kratom extract if you’re truly looking to get the absolute most bang for your buck.
As a kratom retailer, Kratom Spot is not allowed to make dosage recommendations. If you purchase our red vein Sumatra kratom capsules, each capsule is pre-filled with 0.7 grams of red vein Sumatra Kratom powder so you don’t have to worry about measuring dosage yourself. If you purchase red vein or white vein Sumatra kratom powder, or Sumatra kratom extract in powdered form, we recommend that you consult the American Kratom Association (AKA) for dosage information.
Yes! Like all Kratom Spot products, our Sumatra kratom products are third-party lab-tested to ensure safety, potency, and efficacy. We make absolutely sure that you’re getting what you paid for. Furthermore, our Sumatra kratom products are manufactured using industry-leading technology and Fair Trade practices. Taking kratom shouldn’t be anxiety-inducing– quite the opposite, in fact! That’s why we take every step to ensure that our Sumatra kratom products are the best there is.
Yes! Sumatra kratom carries the classic earthy taste often associated with kratom. Because of this, it serves as an excellent strain for kratom tea. We recommend combining your desired amount of Sumatra kratom powder with freshly-brewed green tea or black tea for the best taste. However, we’ve also tried blending Sumatra kratom with oolong tea and we’re quite pleased with the results! Just make sure to make your Sumatra kratom tea exactly how you’d make other kratom teas for the best outcome.
